content: the crochet moss stitch or the linen stitch or the granite stitch is one of my favorite crochet stitches i simply love the woven knit look and the texture of the moss stitch this stitch is very beginner friendly stitch it is a great stitch for advanced crocheters too because of its wonderful rich textured look it is worked up with only single_crochet and chain stitches the moss stitch in itself is a versatile stitch there are many ways to work the moss stitch it can be worked in row corner to corner of in circles to make a square today am sharing the pattern for a very quick and easy crochet moss stitch square blanket which is made in the rounds working the moss stitch square is easy and makes a great blanket the stitch works up pretty quick it is one of those stitches that can be crocheted without too much concentration and the need to keep a track of the stitch counts you can always use solid color yarn or change the colour at certain rounds but the variegated yarn works the best with this stitch materials used - cotton variegated cake yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 40 inches- customizable to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/v-yyklbzs2e
